products.title: Iphone 13 Pro Grafit
products.desc: The iPhone 13 Pro Max's new Super Retina XDR with ProMotion display can refresh at different rates between 10 and 120 times per second, depending on what you're doing. It automatically knows when to deliver maximum graphics performance.
